name: Arrow Again
description: The temporal anomaly crisis appears to be over! The Federation prepares to celebrate one last Convergence Day, but some are not convinced this is the last....
rules:
-- Unique Section 31, Klingon Empire, and Ferengi Alliance Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using K'Ehleyr, Gray, Natasha Yar or Cultural Figure will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: K'Ehleyr, Gray, Natasha Yar or Cultural Figure
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Uxbridge
featured_crew.flavor: “An immortal being sworn to pacifism grapples with the ramifications of his grief and rage.”

action.name: You don’t understand the scope of my crime

featured_crew.name: Gray
featured_crew.flavor: Now a part of Adira, Gray supports them unseen.

featured_crew.name: Yar
featured_crew.flavor: Refugee of an alternate universe in which the Enterprise-C fought daily battles against the Klingon Empire.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

screens.text: "Captain, I can't believe it's true, but... the temporal anomaly crisis is over. All the lost have returned to this timeline, and no new anomalies are being reported."

"The crisis hasn't just ended, but ended in the most optimal way. Those who would have been dead in this timeline, like myself, have been preserved. Your scientists say it was a breakthrough, a silver lining. I'm alive, so... why should I question it?"

"Our orders are to celebrate one last Convergence Day, the holiday we formed to honor when the temporal anomaly crisis began. I suppose we have to follow orders, but... something about this doesn't seem right...."
